TopicTitle: KSP crashing ever since History Expansion installment

Articles.Content:
Hey,

Since i installed the DLC my game keeps crashing. I don't know what it is. I run it completely vanilla (no mods beside the DLC). 

It tends to crash when it loads something. Vessel on launch pad, the VAB, SPH etc. I start KSP out of the steam window with th 32 bit version.

Does anyone has these issues too? Is it the fresh new DLC causing that or did i do something?

Thanks for answers!

52 minutes ago, SpaceTrashCan said:

I start KSP out of the steam window with th 32 bit version.

Well, the DLC made the game too big for the 4GB limit of the 32bit version. You need to use the 64bit version.
okay, how do I? The steam launcher gives me the option between "Play Kerbal Space Program" and "Launch KSP (32 Bit)". It tends to crash either way unfortunatly
same for me. crashing almost everytime i want to fly a vessel or sometimes randomly...

1 hour ago, SpaceTrashCan said:

okay, how do I? The steam launcher gives me the option between "Play Kerbal Space Program" and "Launch KSP (32 Bit)". It tends to crash either way unfortunatly

The first one is the 64bit version. If you only have 4gb of RAM then that will obviously be no relief. You also might want to upload your log files:
Okay, Thank You very much so far.
